text: Well this is certainly a first for this channel: 3 uploads from 3 different ports of the "same" game. The Amiga version with Best VGM 1698 , the SNES version (known as Eek the Cat) with Best VGM 1699 and now the Amiga CD32 version. Gotta love the bass and guitar in this one.

text: Oh, man, this takes me back. I had this game back in the mid-90s. Probably had the only CD32 in the city too. Don't think I finished it, but I listened to the soundtrack over and over by putting it in the CD player. Did the same for Sonic CD too.
